== Introduction ==

The Phoenix Operating System's API (Application Programming Interface) is geared towards not only simplicity, but ease of use by the developer.

== Details ==

To use the Phoenix API, just include api.h in your program and link in the api.lib library. The API provides:
  * Interaction with hardware
  * Drivers
  * Standard I/O
  * Memory allocation 
  * And more
